description:
Restoration Plan #6
The great Jahy has encountered the Magical Girl again.
This refreshes her terror and she spends her days jumping at shadows.
But when she spots a high school girl holding a mana crystal, she tells the girl to hand it over.
However, the girl turns out to be the Magical Girl in her regular form.
What`s more, she has the propensity to attract all manners of bad fortune.
It turns out that she attacked the Dark Realm with good intentions.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La grande Jahy n`a pas l`air de pouvoir gagner...
The Great Jahy Doesn`t Seem to Stand a Chance...
ジャヒー様は勝てそうもない...
